title: What should be my 10-month strategy for the NEET 2021 if I’m starting from zero? Will I be able to crack NEET in 10 months? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey, Yes you’ll be able to crack Neet if you’ll be able to do what it takes to crack Neet and believe me you have what it takes, Just utilize everyday up to it’s fullest. Now let’s make a strategy for you - First step is to Join a coaching if you can, it helps a lot and yes average run time is around 10 months but if you wanna go for self study then you need to buy Modules of a good coaching, don’t go for different books, Modules are best. You can try to get Allen’s or Aakash Modules they’re the best.Now once you have the resources, Make your mind from starting that you need to go through syllabus at least 3 times of course time for subsequent revisions will be less.Now For Biology NCERT will do for 90% of the questions and read modules with it, as you have plenty of time now for rest of the questions.For Physics and Chem - Modules and Notes if you have some(Not talking about school notes).Also NCERT for inorganic chemistry is highly recommended.Now you’ll probably ask for schedule but man no one can make it for you why? simple because no one knows you better than you, no one knows how your day looks like, so make it yourself. I can only advice you to make a detailed plan to incorporate 3 revisions till Neet and give 50% of the time to first reading and then two revisions and keep a month extra before Neet for any test series. Now I’ve mentioned reading at many placing that doesn’t mean read for just the sake of reading, Make sure you absorb everything that’s in NCERT and module, no matter how many reading it takes. You gotta Study Eat and Repeat throughout these 10 months and don’t ask anyone if modules are enough or not, they’re totally enough if done in right way. I wish you get what you dreamed for, don’t forget to work hard and make sacrifices, but for now That’s been it, Bye

Hii, If u R preparing for neet.,and want to know the strategy for neet 2021, then well u R at the right place.. Look neet is a highly repotative exam and has a vast syllabus cover. But u have 10 month, it is more than sufficient ,, for cracking neet one can require only 6 months..but in ur case u R lucky,u have 10 months. Look if u R starting now, u can crack neet very easily with a very good rank. There are various strategies vedios present on YouTube which u can see..but remember it all goes worthless if u just seeing that videos and not implementing it in ur daily lifestyle… All u have to do is to transform yourself.. Firstly complete ur whole syllabus, and never says that u R at zero level,,no one is at zero level,, u have clear ur 11 std ur 12 std right,,so how can u be at zero level..the fact is that u need to modify ur studies that's it.. After completing ur whole syllabus do 100 mcq practice on daily bases of each subject. U have to find ur weakness and ur strength and work on it..give daily mock test and analyse ur mistakes in it.,make a separate notebook and write all imp questions and revise that on daily basis.,do previous year papers and revise that also. Maintain the timetable by full discipline and sincerity… Don't worry if u R an enthusiastic learner and ready to hardwork for ur dreams and u surely able to fulfill ur dreams.. All the best.,,and hope for the best. Hope u R satisfied ,,if yes plzz upvote Thank you
